quest_desc.qdesc: 300028 - 클레릭 메인퀘에서 지우지 못한 퀘스트 아이템(현자의 지팡이) 지우기

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Did you get the Airship Engine Battery?
Come on, quick.

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
It's been tough on you. Now that we have our power source, Nautilus will be ready to take off soon.

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Uhh...this is odd...Huh? What is this? What happened to the Airship Engine Battery? Why is it so damaged?
Hey, what did you do to this thing?

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
(Tell him the truth that the device was in the ogre's mouth)
What?? Why the hell would an ogre try to eat the Airship Engine Battery?
Anyway, the surface corrosion is quite serious so I don't think I can use this straight away…

${user_nick}$
Do you need any other stuff?

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Don't worry. I'll take care of it.
You should busy yourself with other matters as I'll need time to fix this.(You can move to Saint Haven once you have reached level 24.)

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Alright, all set! Talk to Ticket Agent Arnen and she will guide you through the boarding process. The airship should be ready by the time you're back.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
You should busy yourself with other matters as I need some time to fix this.
(You can go to Saint Haven once you have reached level 24.)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
You didn't leave yet? I thought you were going to Saint Haven.
(Talk to Ticket Agent Arnen to go to Saint Haven)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
I need to report to the King at Saint Haven. {user_nick}, as the person who saved Calderock Village, would you come with me?
(Talk to Ticket Agent Arnen to go to Saint Haven)

$Ticket Agent Sorene$
How can I help you?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Hmph! You'll be sorry if you look down on the Sorceresses!
…Who the heck is this? Go away if you're not here for me. I don't talk to shabbily-dressed people.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hmm... This is bad...
The fate of this kingdom is like a candle in the wind... I'm worried.

$King Cassius$
I can't just talk to anyone. I'm b-busy! Go away….
…But you'll come back, won't you…?

$Duke Stuart$
I heard about you. Pretty awesome job you did at the other village.
By right, you should be rewarded, but we're in a time of crisis. We'll leave that for later.

$Royal Guard Joey$
I'm on my guard duty. I'm not allowed to talk to civilians.

$Ticket Agent Arnen$
Hello adventurer.
Thanks to you, the repair of Airship Nautilus could be completed and it can fly again. I don't know how to thank you enough.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
There are so many things to report about. I'm overwhelmed right now.
(You have to finish the previous quest)

$Argenta$
So you've arrived at Saint Haven. This place is still full of unnecessary stuff. Hmph, why do humans like to live in crowded places?

${user_nick}$
I'm not sure….

$Argenta$
You don't know anything, do you?
Anyway, I got to go.

${user_nick}$
Where are you going?

$Argenta$
I am going to find Geraint of course. Where did you think I was going?
Bye then… go your own way.

${user_nick}$
My own way?

$Argenta$
Well there's a guy who has been staring at you all this while.
He'll tell you what to do.(Argenta points at Elite Soldier Calrim.)

$Argenta$
Why are you still here?
Go and talk to that human soldier.
(Argenta points to Elite Soldier Calrim)

$Argenta's Slave David$
Ha. Ha. Ha. You think you're fit to serve Master Argenta?
I'm sorry but that's a job for David! Me! Ha! Ha! Ha!

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
{user_nick}, isn't that beautiful lady over there your companion? I think she wants to bid you farewell. Go talk to her first.
(Calrim is looking at Argenta.)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Well, like I told you, I need to report to King Cassius. I hope you haven't forgotten about my request...

${user_nick}$
Should we go now?

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Yes. However, I'll be going to the Royal Castle first, as the procedures are quite lengthy. You should get some rest first. When you're ready, please talk to Ticket Agent Sorene. She'll guide you through.

$Ticket Seller Sorene$
Oh, {user_class} {user_nick}.
You were with Elite Soldier Calrim.
Elite Soldier Calrim is already inside the Royal Castle.

$Ticket Seller Sorene$
Elite Soldier Calrim told me that you should join him in the Royal Castle as soon as the procedures are done. You will see Royal Guard Joey at the entrance of the Royal Castle. Speak with him, and he'll let you enter.

${user_nick}$
Thank you.

$Ticket Seller Sorene$
Goodbye.
I wish you a pleasant stay in Saint Haven.

$Ticket Seller Sorene$
Elite Soldier Calrim is already inside the Royal Castle. You should head inside as well. You will see Royal Guard Joey at the entrance of the Royal Castle. Speak with him, and he'll usher you in.

$Guardsman$
Halt!
You look suspicious. Under whose permission are you stepping into this territory?

${user_nick}$
I am here to assist in a report to the King.

$Royal Guard Joey$
Huh? Ah...oh, you must be {user_class} {user_nick}.
Elite Soldier Calrim has informed me about you.

${user_nick}$
So can I go in?

$Royal Guard Joey$
Yes, you may enter. Elite Soldier Calrim is waiting for your arrival. He told me to let you in right away.

$Royal Guard Joey$
I'm on guard duty. I'm not allowed to talk to civilians.

$Royal Guard Joey$
You should see Elite Soldier Calrim waiting for you upon entering.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Ah, there you are. I have already reported to the King, and told him about you, {user_nick}. Please go to His Highness and report to him as well.

${user_nick}$
I can speak directly to him?

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Yes. I've explained to him almost everything that happened in Calderock Village. However, I was not directly involved with the incident regarding the Prophet. Thus I left most of that out. Kindly fill him about that in detail.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Yes, but it would be more appropriate if you go alone. This is a royal palace and there are rules to be observed...
* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
The Black Knight has attacked and wounded many of our troops, and we even lost track of the Prophet. I am really ashamed. However thanks to you, {user_nick}, we know the location of the Prophet. The King should be at least comforted by that.

${user_nick}$
Well... He didn't seem pleased.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
I don't think so. Since I made a report to His Highness, he will take care of this.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Lady Kayleen$
I'll uncover what that conniving bishop is up to...
Hmph. Does he take me for a fool who follows blindly?
If he regards me as an ordinary sorceress, he's making a big mistake!

${user_nick}$
But if we don't go and look for the Prophet now….

$Lady Kayleen$
Are you trying to order the Court Sorceress around?
Who says that I'm not going to search for the Prophet?
I simply find it unfair that I should act first, when the General, the Duke, and the Bishop are still idling here.

$Duke Stuart$
Hmm... We need to go after the Black Knight immediately. However, we are unable to use the Royal Guards... The Court Sorceress and the Bishop are wasting time trying to evade their assistance... This...this is a problem.

$Duke Stuart$
The Court Sorceress and the Bishop are only concerned about their own affairs. They can act this way because the current King is easily intimidated.
When the previous King was on the throne, this sort of nonsense was unheard of...

$Duke Stuart$
Anyway, with the given situation, it's not easy for me to make a decision now.
Sorry I couldn't help.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You really did an excellent job.
If it weren't for you, we would never have known the prophet's location.
Moreover, you have also displayed your great heroic strengh and saved Calderock Village. You are truly, truly a remarkable individual. You are definitely bound for greater things.

${user_nick}$
But if we don't go and look for the Prophet now….

$Bishop Ignacio$
Ah, yes. The Prophet!
Are you sure it was the Black Knight who took the girl away?

${user_nick}$
Yes, I saw it with my own eyes.

$Bishop Ignacio$
The Black Knight dared to destroy our airships and kill our soldiers… and he even had the nerve to kidnap the Prophet! Who does he think he is? Hmm...I fear that the Prophet is not safe with him.
(The Bishop sighs worryingly)

$Bishop Ignacio$
The Prophet must be found and rescued as soon as possible. However, there aren't any troops that we can send right now. I don't know what to do.

${user_nick}$
I'll help.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

qstep_change.comment: 메인 퀘에 레벨 없애기를 진행하면서 유저레벨 체크가 24레벨 이던 것을 1레벨로 변경. (복잡해서 레벨 체크 숫자를 변경함)

journal.title: Operation Airship Nautilus
journal.contents:
You have brought the Airship Engine Battery to Airship Engineer Hubert. Talk to Airship Engineer Hubert.
Calderock Village → Airship Engineer Hubert

journal.title: Going to Saint Haven Royal Castle
journal.contents:
The Airship Nautilus is now fully operational. Talk to Ticket Agent Arnen for the boarding procedure.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Calderock Village → Ticket Agent Arnen
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Ticket Agent Arnen to board the Airship Nautilus

journal.title: Argenta's Farewell
journal.contents:
You have arrived in Saint Haven. It looks like Argenta will make her way alone from here. Bid her goodbye.

Saint Haven → Argenta

journal.title: Elite Soldier Calrim's Guide
journal.contents:
Since you came here on Calrim's request, you should speak with him to get an idea of what to do next.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Saint Haven → Elite Soldier Calrim

journal.title: Arrived
journal.contents:
You have agreed to go to the Royal Castle with Elite Soldier Calrim. Talk to Ticket Agent Sorene to find out where he is.

Saint Haven → Ticket Agent Sorene
journal.todo_msg: Make your way to Saint Haven and speak with Ticket Agent Sorene.

journal.title: Front of the Royal Castle
journal.contents:
It seems like Elite Soldier Calrim has already went into the Royal Castle. Since Elite Soldier Calrim is handling the procedures for you, make your way directly to the Royal Castle. Elite Soldier Calrim said that if you speak with Royal Guard Joey, he will guide you straight in.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Royal Guard Joey
journal.todo_msg: Meet Royal Guard Joey in front of Saint Haven Royal Castle.

journal.title: Elite Soldier Calrim's Report
journal.contents:
Elite Soldier Calrim should be waiting for you inside. Enter the Royal Castle and meet Elite Soldier Calrim.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier Calrim
journal.destination: Talk to Elite Soldier Calrim inside Saint Haven Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Enter Saint Haven Royal Castle and speak with Elite Soldier Calrim

journal.title: Royal Castle's Chaos
journal.contents:
The King cannot afford to assist with the Prophet, as it seems that his castle is under threat. Seek out other nobles and officials.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.destination: Speak with the nobles in Saint Haven Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Appeal to other nobles and officials for help.
